DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To evaluate effect technique Breath Stacking ( BS ) distribution ventilation chest woman morbid obesity . Methods : Randomized clinical trial , blind , control 32 woman ( BMI ≥ 40kg/m2 ) , separate two group : control ( GC ) n = 16 41.94 ± 9.38 year group Breath Stacking ( GBS ) , n = 16 40.38 ± 10.16 year . Optoelectronic plethysmography ( POE ) use assess lung ventilation . For BS technique use mask expiratory branch occlude Wright spirometer . GBS hold three technique interval three minute . The GC use circuit without occlusion expiratory branch . Results : GBS find high contribution tidal volume ( VT ) chest circumference ( p = 0.04 ) decrease abdominal compartment ( p = 0.03 ) , whereas CG show difference distribution . Spirometric variable : FEV1 ( % ) , FVC ( % ) , FEV1/FVC ( % ) , VC CI show difference technical BS GBS GC . Conclusions : The technique BS alter distribution pattern regional ventilation , result great contribution lung volume lower rib cage , correspond activity diaphragm , redistribution volume compartment .
DOC.brief_title: Use Breath Stacking Technique Regional Ventilation Box Chest Women With Morbid Obesity
DOC.criteria: Women age 1960 year BMI ≥ 40 kg/m2 Women chronic lung disease Smokers Neuromuscular disease Disability performing procedure
